description: The image shows a shelf with various products. There are several bottles of lotion, with the most prominent bottle located in the center of the shelf. Additionally, there are two bottles of water, one on the left and one on the right side of the shelf. There are also two bottles of milk, one on the left and one on the right side of the shelf.
